title: Summer Queen
description: Persephone’s been stolen from me.Out of my mountain, out of my reach. I’ll do anything to get her back, even break a truce that’s kept my kingdom safe.I can only breathe again when she’s back in my arms.When I can make her pay for every second I spent in fear.I want more than her body given to me in debt. I want her heart. And I will punish her until it’s mine.Summer Queen is the second book in the King of Shadows series by USA Today bestselling author Amelia Wilde. King of Shadows must be read first.
author: Amelia Wilde
